query_string.query: message:cmdlog AND ( message:avcstat OR message:audit2allow OR message:audit2why OR message:chcon OR message:checkpolicy OR message:fixfiles OR message:genhomedircon OR message:getsebool OR message:getenforce OR message:matchpathcon OR message:newrole OR message:restorecon OR message:run_init OR message:selinuxenabled OR message:sestatus OR message:setfiles OR message:setsebool OR message:setenforce OR message:passwd OR message:visudo OR message:/etc/passwd OR message:/etc/shadow OR message:/etc/group OR message:useradd OR message:userdel OR message:groupadd OR message:gpasswd OR message:smbpasswd OR message:iptables OR message:firewalld OR message:firewall-cmd OR message:audit.log )
